Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 18 Uppannattika » 18.7 Pañhāvāra » 18.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 18.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nissaya
Uppannattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nissaya
8.
2604Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo—  uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo…pe…  dve khandhā…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhā vatthussa…pe…  vatthu khandhānaṃ…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa…pe…  kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa…pe…  vatthu uppannānaṃ khandhānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
<< Aññamaññaup Upanissaya >>
